original_text: Nobody should love his own father and mother more than he loves me. If he does, he cannot be my disciple. Nobody should love his own son or daughter more than he loves me. If he does, then he cannot be my disciple.
korean_text: 아버지나 어머니를 나보다 더 사랑하는 자는 내게 합당하지 아니하고 아들이나 딸을 나보다 더 사랑하는 자도 내게 합당하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: Nobody should love his own father and mother

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내 제자가 될 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody should love his own son or daughter
then he cannot be my disciple
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 내 제자가 될 수 없습니다
